name: The Princess's Party
description:
This game was initially made for the Ludum Dare #40 game jam, then expanded into a proof-of-concept for an audio-centric game engine I've been working on for a while.  The intention is that it could be played without eyesight at all, and while it could use some UI improvements I think it pretty much works.  Keep in mind, though, that the content is *very* crude, in particular the voice acting.

While most of the script was written during the 3-days of Ludum Dare #40, it took about 3 weeks to get it in the state it is in, so it's not "officially" a jam entry.
